workflow.name: Transform support emails into FAQs with GPT-4o, Gmail, Notion, and Slack
workflow.description:
## üìò Description:
This end-to-end automation transforms developer support emails into actionable FAQs and sentiment insights using Azure OpenAI GPT-4o, Gmail, Notion, Slack, and Google Sheets.
It not only classifies and summarizes each email into a Notion knowledge base but also detects sentiment and urgency, alerts the team on Slack for critical messages, and automatically replies to users with acknowledgment emails.
Every failed or malformed payload is transparently logged in Google Sheets ‚Äî ensuring zero message loss and full visibility into the AI pipeline.
The result is a complete AI-driven customer support loop, from inbox to Notion and back to the sender.

## ‚öôÔ∏è What This Workflow Does (Step-by-Step)

üü¢ Gmail Polling Trigger ‚Äì Developer Support Inbox
 Continuously monitors the developer support Gmail inbox every minute for new messages.
 Extracts the subject, sender, and snippet to initiate AI analysis.

üîç Validate Email Payload (IF Node)
 Checks if each incoming email contains valid message data (like message ID and subject).
 ‚úÖ True Path: continues to AI analysis
 ‚ùå False Path: logs error details in Google Sheets for debugging.

üß† Configure GPT-4o Model (Azure OpenAI)
 Initializes GPT-4o as the reasoning model for semantic classification of developer support content.

ü§ñ Analyze & Classify Developer Email (AI Agent)
 Interprets each email and produces a structured JSON with:
Problem summary
FAQ category (e.g., API, Billing, UI)
2‚Äì3 line solution
‚ÄúIs recurring‚Äù flag for common issues.

üßπ Parse & Clean AI JSON Output (Code Node)
 Removes code formatting (json) and safely parses GPT-4o‚Äôs output into clean JSON.
 If parsing fails, the raw text and error message are sent to Google Sheets for review.

üìò Save FAQ Entry to Notion Database
 Creates a new FAQ record inside Notion‚Äôs ‚ÄúRelease Notes‚Äù database.
 Stores the problem, category, and solution as searchable structured fields.

üí¨ Announce New FAQ in Slack
 Posts a summary of the new FAQ in Slack with title, category, and answer preview.
 Includes a link to view the Notion record instantly for team visibility.

üß† Configure GPT-4o Model (Sentiment Analysis)
 Sets up another GPT-4o instance focused on understanding tone, emotion, and urgency of each email.

‚ù§Ô∏è Analyze Email Sentiment & Urgency (AI Agent)
 Analyzes the email content to determine:
Urgency: Low, Medium, High, Critical
Sentiment: Positive, Neutral, Frustrated, Angry
Immediate response required? (Yes/No)
Provides a short ‚Äúreason‚Äù explaining the classification.

üßπ Parse AI JSON Output ‚Äì Sentiment Analysis
 Cleans and validates the JSON from sentiment AI for consistent field names (urgency, sentiment, reason).

‚öñÔ∏è Filter Critical or High-Urgency Emails (IF Node)
 Checks if urgency == High or Critical.
 ‚úÖ True Path: triggers escalation to Slack
 ‚ùå False Path: ends quietly to avoid unnecessary noise.

üö® Alert Team in Slack ‚Äì Critical Issue
 Sends an immediate Slack alert with:
Email snippet
Detected urgency and sentiment
Short justification (reason)
CTA for urgent action.
 Ensures fast team response to high-priority issues.

üì® Send Acknowledgment Email to Sender (Gmail Node)
 Automatically replies to the customer confirming receipt and providing a short AI-generated solution summary.
 Thanks the user and links the response back to the knowledge base ‚Äî creating a closed-loop support experience.

ü™∂ Log Workflow Errors to Google Sheets
 Appends all failed validations, missing fields, or JSON parsing issues to the ‚Äúerror log sheet.‚Äù
 Provides a live audit trail for monitoring workflow health.

## üß© Prerequisites
1. Gmail account with API access
2. Azure OpenAI (GPT-4o) credentials
3. Notion API integration (for FAQ database)
4. Slack API access (for team alerts)
5. Google Sheets (for logging errors)

## üí° Key Benefits
 ‚úÖ Converts support emails into structured FAQs automatically
 ‚úÖ Detects sentiment & urgency for faster triage
 ‚úÖ Keeps Notion knowledge base continuously updated
 ‚úÖ Sends Slack alerts for critical issues instantly
 ‚úÖ Maintains transparent error logs in Google Sheets

## üë• Perfect For
1. Developer Relations or Product Support Teams
2. SaaS companies managing large support volumes
3. Teams using Gmail, Notion, and Slack for internal comms
4. Startups automating customer response and knowledge creation

parameters.content:
## Error Handling & Logging
Records any parsing or API errors into a Google Sheet for debugging.  
Ensures every failed event is logged and traceable.

nodes.name: Gmail Polling Trigger ‚Äì Developer Support Inbox

options.systemMessage:
=You are an AI assistant trained to analyze developer support emails and identify recurring questions or issues.

Your task:
1. Read the email subject and snippet.
2. Summarize the main problem.
3. Identify the most likely FAQ category (e.g., API, Authentication, Billing, Setup, Errors, UI).
4. Suggest a short FAQ title.
5. Write a 2‚Äì3 line clear and helpful answer.
6. Detect if it matches an existing FAQ type (is_recurring = true/false).

Return result in **valid JSON** only.

nodes.name: Save FAQ Entry to Notion Database
Log Workflow Errors to Google Sheets

parameters.content:
## Acknowledgment & Feedback Loop
Automatically replies to the sender with a polite acknowledgment and  
AI-generated answer, confirming that their issue was added to the FAQ base.

parameters.text:
=Analyze this email and determine:
1. Urgency level (Low/Medium/High/Critical)
2. Customer sentiment (Positive/Neutral/Frustrated/Angry)
3. Requires immediate response? (Yes/No)

Email: {{ $('Gmail Polling Trigger ‚Äì Developer Support Inbox').item.json.snippet }}

Return only JSON:
{
  "urgency": "High",
  "sentiment": "Frustrated",
  "immediate_response_needed": "Yes",
  "reason": "brief explanation"
}

options.systemMessage: =You are an expert at analyzing customer support emails. Rate urgency and sentiment accurately and concisely

nodes.name: Parse AI JSON Output ‚Äì Sentiment Analysis
Alert Team in Slack ‚Äì Critical Issue

parameters.sendTo: ={{ $('Gmail Polling Trigger ‚Äì Developer Support Inbox').item.json.From.match(/<(.+?)>/)?.[1] || $('Gmail Polling Trigger ‚Äì Developer Support Inbox').item.json.From }}
parameters.message:
=Hi there,

Thank you for reaching out! We've received your question and added it to our knowledge base.

Here's a quick answer to help you:

üìå Issue: {{ $('Parse & Clean AI JSON Output').item.json.problem_summary }}
üí° Solution: {{ $('Parse & Clean AI JSON Output').item.json.faq_answer }}

Our team will follow up if additional assistance is needed.

Best regards,
Developer Support Team
parameters.subject: ={{ $('Gmail Polling Trigger ‚Äì Developer Support Inbox').item.json.snippet }}

parameters.content:
## How it works
This automation streamlines developer support management by turning incoming Gmail emails into structured FAQ entries.  
It continuously monitors your support inbox, validates each message, and uses Azure OpenAI GPT-4o to analyze the content.  
The AI classifies the issue, summarizes it, and creates a concise FAQ title and answer.  
The result is parsed into clean JSON, stored in a Notion database, and shared with your internal team via Slack.  
Critical or urgent emails are separately analyzed for sentiment and priority ‚Äî instantly alerting your team if immediate action is required.  
Each failure or parsing issue is automatically logged in Google Sheets for easy troubleshooting.  
The workflow also sends an acknowledgment email back to the original sender, closing the communication loop.

## Setup steps
1. Connect your credentials:
   - Gmail (inbox and sender)
   - Azure OpenAI API
   - Notion database (‚ÄúRelease Notes‚Äù)
   - Slack workspace
   - Google Sheets (for error logs)
2. Replace Notion Database ID and Google Sheet IDs with your own.
3. Update Slack user/channel in the Slack nodes.
4. Adjust Gmail trigger polling frequency if needed.
5. Run once manually to confirm all credentials and data mappings.

## Email Intake & Validation
Polls the Gmail inbox for new support messages.  
Ensures valid payload (ID, subject, body) before AI processing.  
Invalid or empty messages are routed to the Google Sheets error log.

## AI Analysis & FAQ Generation
Uses GPT-4o to read each email and generate structured FAQ data ‚Äî  
including summary, category, short solution, and recurrence flag.  
The output is cleaned and converted to valid JSON for downstream use.

## Knowledge Storage & Team Notification
Saves the AI-generated FAQ entry to Notion and notifies your team on Slack.  
Each new FAQ includes title, category, and answer snippet with a Notion link.  
Helps your team stay aligned on new recurring issues.

## Urgency & Sentiment Detection
Analyzes the emotional tone and urgency of incoming emails.  
Flags critical or frustrated messages for instant Slack escalation.  
Ensures urgent support requests are handled in real time.

Parse AI JSON Output ‚Äì Sentiment Analysis
Alert Team in Slack ‚Äì Critical Issue

With deep expertise in building open-source workflow automation and self-hosted automation platforms, he helps organizations eliminate manual processes through intelligent n8n ai agent automation solutions.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
